document.full_text: the mississippi river may have reached its highest level at memphis early on tuesday just inches below the all-time record, according to the national weather service, as a wall of water moved south toward the gulf of mexico.
document.title: mississippi river crests at memphis inches below record
lines_and_colors: the mississippi river may have reached its highest level at memphis early on tuesday just inches below the all-time record, according to the national weather service, as a wall of water moved south toward the gulf of mexico.
